Main Page   Modules   Data Structures   File List   Data Fields  

IPL98 ANSI C Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
T2DFloat2-dimensional point with float (FLOAT32) values
T2DInt2-dimensional point with signed integer (INT16) values
T3D2DPointsHolds a list of corresponding 3D-2D points
T3DFloat3-dimensional point with float (FLOAT32) values
T3DInt3-dimensional point with signed integer (INT16) values
TCameraMatrixThis is the camera matrix explained in Gonzales and Woods
TCameraParametersThe camera parameters derived in the PhD Thesis "Industrial Vision" by Ole Knudsen, 1997, chapter 2.2
TComplexImageAn image containing real and imaginary pixels of type FLOAT32
TFileInfoFile information for an image
TFloatImageAn image containing pixels of type FLOAT32
TImageAll the information about a general image
TIntImageAn image containing pixels of type INT16
TIplTextContains a list of strings used to insert lines with information about operations performed
TMomentStructure for moment values
TPalettePalette information for an image
TPixelGroupA group of pixels found by a segmentation algorithm
TPixelGroupsA container for TPixelGroup structures
TSinglePointSetHolds a single set of corresponding 3D-2D points and optionally an Id
TStatisticA container for the statistical values
TStringA container for a string, includes corresponding functions to manipulate the string
Tag
